[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”row-tourpage-description max_width_800 margin_left_auto margin_right_auto”][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class=”text_aligned_center”]

One of the Best Things to Do in Saigon at Night!

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Want to see a different side of Saigon and discover how the locals really live? Let us take you outside of District 1 and show you parts of the city that most visitors don’t get to experience. Saigon looks much different at night than it does in the daytime… from the lights of the red paper lanterns in Cholon, to the food ghettos of District 10, our amazing XO Girls will safety guide you through hidden streets and tiny alleyways that very few travelers to Saigon ever explore![/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]The “XO Saigon by Night Tour” is one of the most unique things to do in Ho Chi Minh City!  On this tour, you’ll get to visit huge night markets where only the locals shop. We’ll also serve you a variety of delicious street food that will delight your taste buds! This night time experience was personally designed by our founder, Ms. Hong, to share her experience growing up Saigon. [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”block-tour-video”]
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”text_align_center max_width_600 margin_left_auto margin_right_auto”]“ This tour includes plenty of food but is not a food tour, The Saigon by Night Tour focuses on the culture of Saigon, so you’ll really see how the locals work, live and eat![/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”text_aligned_center”]

Top Things to do in Saigon at Night featured on this tour!

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

  • Food –  Authentic street food provided by the same company that offers the famous “XO Foodie” street food tour 
  • Sights– Shotgun through 4 of the most famous districts in Saigon at night
  • Culture – Visit a local home to see how many locals truly live

This tour is one of the most exciting things to do in Saigon at night and offers a completely different experience from our other tours. While our morning “Sights of Saigon” tour delves into the city’s history, and the renowned “XO Foodie Tour” spotlights Vietnamese cuisine, the “Saigon by Night Tour” focuses on culture and provides our guests an exclusive opportunity to visit the childhood home of our founder, Ms. Hong.

**** PLEASE NOTE: Visiting Ms. Hong’s apartment requires climbing 2 flights of stairs. Additionally if you are not comfortable going inside a local home, we would not recommend booking this tour. ****

On the “Saigon by Night Tour” you’ll get to explore 4 of the most popular local districts in the city often overlooked by tourists, while enjoying delicious Vietnamese street food! Savor dishes like the crispy “Banh Xeo” (fried crepes stuffed with various meats and vegetables ) and the lesser known Bo La Lot (Grilled beef wrapped in betel leaves)  which is our personal favorite! Don’t worry vegetarians, we also have you covered with a variety of delicious options![/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”block-more-gallery-blog text_align_center max_width_600 margin_left_auto margin_right_auto”]To see more fun videos and photos from all our city tours

Visit our Gallery!

or visit our Blog

for some of the best Vietnam Travel Tips![/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”text_align_center max_width_800 margin_left_auto margin_right_auto”][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

How many people in a group?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Please note that this tour is offered on a join in basis, so there may be other guests joining you on the tour. Our maximum group size is 8 people. For guests that do not want to go in a group, we also offer a private tour option for an extra charge.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”block-recommend text_align_center”]

For a comprehensive overview of Ho Chi Minh City,
we recommend booking both the

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”block-cool-momento max_width_600 margin_left_auto margin_right_auto”]

Want a cool momento to show off
to your friends and family?

We can film your ride (for an extra 50USD) and create a special video of your Vietnam Adventure! We can also mix in a custom music track in your video upon request.

See Optional Services ↓[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”row-tourpage-extend”][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class=”block-scratch-top”] [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”block-tour-includes max_width_800 margin_left_auto margin_right_auto”]

Tour Includes
XO Accident Insurance
High quality open-faced helmet
Free hotel pickup and dropoff
(District 1, 3, 4 and 5 – some exclusions apply)
2 Dinner Dishes + Local Fruits + Dessert
English speaking tour guide, motorbike, fuel
Water/Beer/Soft drinks/Tea
Pictures from your tour
(Emailed to you later)
Rain poncho
(if needed)
… and lots of smiles : )

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”block-tour-includes block-optional-services max_width_800 margin_left_auto margin_right_auto”]

Optional Services
Tour video
Add 50USD or 1,260,000VND
Private tour
Add 25USD/person – Minimum of 2 adults

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”block-not-equal max_width_800 margin_left_auto margin_right_auto text_align_center”]Not all motorbike tours are created equal!

To find out why we’re different, and why you
should book with XO Tours

Click Here[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”block-scratch-bottom”] [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”row-tourpage-fillfast max_width_600 margin_left_auto margin_right_auto”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Our tours fill up fast,
so book early to secure your spots!

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]

[/vc_column_text]
Book Now!
[vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Frequently Asked Questions

[/vc_column_text][vc_accordion active_tab=”false” collapsible=”yes” disable_keyboard=”yes” title_size=”h4″ style=”3″ el_class=”tour-faq”][vc_accordion_tab title=”What is the difference between the “Saigon by Night“ and “XO Foodie Tour?“”][vc_column_text]The “XO Foodie Tour” as you can tell by the name is a food tour. On this tour you will get to try 10-12 unique dishes that most other tours in Vietnam do not offer. We also include a couple of unique sightseeing stops on the tour.

And although you do get dinner and dessert on the “Saigon by Night” tour, it is NOT A FOOD TOUR. This tour focuses on Vietnamese culture. The highlight of the “Saigon by Night” tour is an opportunity to visit a local home, which will give you a better understanding of how the locals live, work and eat.

The itineraries for both the “XO Foodie” and “Saigon by Night” tours are unique and do not overlap.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”Do you offer a car option if I don’t want to go by motorbike?”][vc_column_text]Yes, we offer a car/bus option if you book a private tour (minimum of 2 adults).  There is a $50 USD surcharge to book a car for 2-4 people and an additional $5 USD per person for groups over 4 people ($50 for 4 pax, $55 for 5 pax, $60 for 6 pax, etc.). The surcharge is to cover the cost of the car/bus rental (with driver). Please keep in mind that the car/bus option is only available for private tours, and we cannot mix different transport methods (car + motorbikes), so everyone in the same group will have to use the same transport option. We also require at least 24 hours notice if you wish to join one of our tours by car/bus.

We do not offer a car/bus option for the group tours since traveling by car/bus is much slower than by motorbike and out of consideration for our other guests we cannot delay the tour for any single party.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”row-other-tour-wrapper”][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class=”row-other-tour-title”]

Our Other Tours

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator el_width=”10″ el_class=”row-other-tour-separator”][vc_row_inner el_class=”row-other-tour-cols”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text el_class=”margin_bottom_0″]
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”text_align_center”]

Over 8000 five star reviews! What our customers say about XO!

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”block-repuso-wrapper max_width_1300 margin_left_auto margin_right_auto”] [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Want to see a different side of Saigon? Let us take you outside of district 1 and show you areas that most visitors don’t get to see.

meta._seopress_titles_title: One of the most fun things to do in Saigon at Night
meta._seopress_titles_desc: This exhilarating scooter tour is one of the most fun things to do in Saigon at night; combining delicious street food with a tour through 4 unique districts.
